value.title: IBM’s Watson Assistant can now field election questions
value.excerpt: IBM is teaming up with states to deploy a Watson Assistant solution that answers questions about the election via phone or online.

value.title: Observe.AI Bags $54 Mn In Series B Round Led By Menlo Ventures
value.excerpt: Observe.AI, a contact centre artificial intelligence (AI) startup, announced that it has raised a $54 million Series B round led by Menlo Ventures, with participation from Next47 Ventures and NGP Capital.

value.title: IBM, Nielsen Partner on AI Weather-Based Ad Service
value.excerpt: The service uses machine-learning models to find correlations between weather and sales data across the U.S., and then recommends actions for marketers.

value.title: Mark Zuckerberg on why he doesn’t want to “put an Apple Watch on your face”
value.excerpt: Social networks contain multitudes. One day you’re writing about internal dissent over the company’s ability to uproot influence campaigns and election interference; the very next, you’re watching a live stream of the same company’s foray into virtual reality helmets and designer mixed reality glasses.

value.title: Snowflake’s IPO is a bet on companies using AI for everything
value.excerpt: Snowflake's $70 billion valuation is based on its ability to analyze cloud data faster and cheaper than its competitors.

value.title: Facebook, Ray-Ban Team Up on Smart Glasses
value.excerpt: To prepare, Facebook will have hundreds of employees wear a research version of the smart glasses, dubbed Project Aria, to gather data on how they work in the real world.

value.title: Do Algorithms Dreams Of Electric Speech? What Virtual Philip K. Dick Can Teach Us About AI

value.title: Pandemic brings robot waiters to South Korean restaurants
value.excerpt: South Korean telecom company KT has partnered with restaurant chain Mad for Garlic on a pilot program using an AI-powered serving robot in Seoul.

value.title: Qualcomm details Cloud AI 100 chipset, announces developer kit

value.title: Aidoc raises $20 million more for its computer vision medical tools
value.excerpt: Aidoc, which bills itself as an AI solutions provider for radiologists, today closed a $20 million extension to the series B it raised in April 2019.

value.title: Robot research vessel to set off on epic ocean voyage of discovery
value.excerpt: On the 400th anniversary of the start of an epic voyage from England to the New World aboard the Mayflower, an autonomous, solar-powered marine research vessel is due to launch on a mission to gather environmental data about the ocean.

value.title: Nasdaq makes push into anti-money laundering tech with new AI-based system
value.excerpt: Exchange group Nasdaq said on Wednesday that it is launching AI technology to help retail and commercial banks automate anti-money laundering (AML)investigations, as it expands into the financial crime software market.

value.title: Over 1,000 parents sign open letter protesting facial recognition in schools
value.excerpt: More than 1,000 parents from all 50 U.S. states signed an open letter advocating for a ban on facial recognition in schools.

value.title: Life academy promotes ethical ways AI can with help food security
value.excerpt: As part of its ongoing collaboration with two of the world's leading developers of AI software, the Pontifical Academy for Life will launch a new joint project looking at ethical ways artificial intelligence can be used to guarantee food security.

value.title: Uber backup driver charged in fatal 2018 self-driving car crash
